attributes.action: Look into the dangers of the LHC at CERN and take appropriate action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Look into the dangers and if necessary take action to prevent the turn on of the LHC.

The Large Hadron Collider at CERN goes online next month, this particle accellerator will be causing collisions of nuclei at unprecidented velocities, and there is a chance that that could lead to the creation of micro black holes, ones at near zero momentum, which would be captured by earths gravity.

Not enough is known about whether Hawking Radiation is real to count on it to cause any black holes created to evaporate.

On top of that there is also the risk of creating "strangelets" a type of particle that could possibly cause run a way fussion of surrounding matter.

Numerous scientists share these concerns, if there is a risk to the world then the LHC should not be activated until things such as Hawking Radiation have been actually observed, so far there is no emperical or observational evidence to support Hawking radiation.
